titleStmt.title: London's remembrancer, or, A true accompt of every particular weeks christnings and mortality in all the years of pestilence within the cognizance of the bills of mortality, being xviii years.
titleStmt.author: Bell, John.
Worshipful Company of Parish Clerks.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by E. Cotes, Printer to the Company of Parish Clerks,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
